system.description: Opal is a gemstone known for its captivating play of colors, displaying flashes of blue, green, red, and yellow on a smooth, polished surface. Its iridescence and unique patterns make it highly valued in jewelry, adding a vibrant and mesmerizing effect to any piece.
system.unidentifiedDesc: Opal is a gemstone known for its captivating play of colors, displaying flashes of blue, green, red, and yellow on a smooth, polished surface. Its iridescence and unique patterns make it highly valued in jewelry, adding a vibrant and mesmerizing effect to any piece.
